tswitem.name: Charmed Augment Resonator
tswitem.tooltip:
Charmed Augment Resonator
An unattuned survivability augment.
Resonating this augment to an active ability will give you a beneficial effect that increases your magical and physical protection by 10/ 20/ 30/ 40/ 50 and your evade rating by 25/ 50/ 75/ 100/ 125 for 5 seconds whenever you activate this ability.
To attune this augment, place it in the assembly window with:
  • 3 Attuned Robust Augment Resonators
  • 16 Pure yggdrasil runes
  • 12 Pure pentagram runes
  • 12 Pure koru runes
